EmailTemplate.description: Email notification to lead queue member
EmailTemplate.name: New lead in queue reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: New lead - {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}({!Lead.Company}) is directed in your lead queue {!Lead.Lead_Queue__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear lead queue manager,
The following lead : {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} from {!Lead.Company} is directed in the queue {!Lead.Lead_Queue__c}. Here is a link to the lead : {!Lead.Link}
Please ensure that a queue member takes ownership of the lead by clicking the "Accept" button and processing the inquiry.
Best regards, DPT India Team
